nodes.text: The Mhalanduin system was located in the Oktos sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the Mhalanduin Reformation, an event that occurred at some point by 0 BBY.
The Mhalanduin system was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed it in grid square R-12.
